group_1.textRight: Ah, Hime-chan.

group_1.textLeft: I see you got here first.

group_1.textCenter: Your Highness, your Highness! We were so worried@about you yesterday!
(Guess I did put those two off, after all...)
(...Right now I've gotta apologize to these three.)
Sorry about yesterday, like, for realsies! This cutie@freaked out *way* bad...

group_1.textRight: Oh... What happened?

group_1.textLeft: To be totes honest with you? I was scared, y'know...
I got scared you were all sick of me, and were@gonna leave my side...

group_1.textRight: Hold on a second. What suddenly brought that on?
Ermm...
Maybe it was because we couldn't hang out with@you all of a sudden, and were late to reply...?

group_1.textLeft: Mhm...
Thinking 'bout it calmly, it was, like, so grody right?@Probably grossed you all out...
All those notifs on your phones must have been@seriously annoying, too...
But for real though, I super-super didn't wanna@be left alone by you guys...

group_1.textRight: Is that so...
Apologies, Princess. It was my fault yesterday.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...

group_1.textRight: As I told you, Miyu and I had Youth Association@activities to complete.
The work you helped us out with the day before yesterday backfired,
and it ended up taking extra time...
And besides, and besides!
Because we were busy with physical chores,@we didn't have time to check our phones...

group_1.textLeft: I see...

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry too, Hime-chan...
I went home yesterday because of the...you know,@the moving thing.
I had to talk to my uncle about it.
We spoke for such a long time,
I didn't notice your calls or messages at all...

group_1.textLeft: So... It *was* all a total misunderstanding on this@cutie's part...

group_1.textRight: I suppose you could say that.

group_1.textLeft: (But... What about Shigurin and Hagurin...)
[chara:102801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Shigurin! Hagurin?!

group_1.textRight: Thank goodness, they're all here...!
I was afraid we'd never meet...

group_1.textLeft: You're overreacting.
You've been helping the Drama Club with their@rehearsals, haven't you?
You must've been dearly busy, without any time@to even respond...

group_1.textRight: Ah, um... Actually.
During rehearsals, I was looking after Shigure-chan's@phone too.
But then... When we were moving around outside,@I fell and dropped our phones in the pond...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Don't say, don't say! You dropped both of them?!

group_1.textRight: [chara:103001:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into][chara:100100:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]*Whimper*...That's right...

group_1.textLeft: I guess that makes sense, with Azumi...

group_1.textRight: We pulled out our old phones instead,
but couldn't find anyone's contact info...
We thought we might be able to find you if we@came here...
Umm... We worried you, didn't we...?

group_1.textLeft: ...I-I know, Hiko-kun! You don't have to tell me...

group_1.textRight: Um, what's the matter with Aika-san...and@everyone else...?

group_1.textLeft: Basically it's like, this cutie misunderstood and@doubted all of you.
I'm seriously sorry for the trouble! And I'm totally@never doing it again, I promise!

group_1.textRight: Everyone makes mistakes and has@misunderstandings, you know.

group_1.textLeft: That's right, that's right!@And Azumi does it all the time!

group_1.textRight: You're one to talk, Miyu...
We don't mind, Hime-chan!♪

group_1.textLeft: ...Thankies!★
...But, since I've made reservations already, why@don't we all just head out together like this?

group_1.textRight: Head out? To where...?

group_1.textLeft: Somewhere we can get hyped, of course!
